title: Railway stations to be modernized to attract tourists
content: Nov 02, Colombo: A Joint Committee consisting of Secretaries to the Ministries of Tourism and Transport will be appointed to expedite the modernization of railway stations to make them attractive to tourists.Its purpose is to avoid delays in existing railway station modernization projects and to complete them expeditiously.The decision was taken at a discussion between Tourism Minister Prasanna Ranatunga, Transport Minister Pavithra Wanniarachchi, officials of the Tourism Development Authority and officials of the Railway Department reently.
